snippet: More than a decade after a vengeful man doused her face in acid, Fakhra Younas jumped to her death in Rome.
abstract: Fakhra Younas, Pakistani woman who was left severely disfigured in 2000 when her ex-husband Bilal Khar threw acid in her face, commits suicide; news of her death galvanizes news media in Pakistan, where lawmakers have vowed to take action and one political leader has called for criminal investigation into the case to be re-opened.

byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani and Elisabetta Povoledo contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: More than a decade after a vengeful man doused her face in acid, Fakhra Younas jumped to her death in Rome.

headline.seo: After Suicide, New Focus on Acid Attacks in Pakistan
headline.main: Years After Acid Horror, Suicide Stirs Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Years After Acid Horror, Suicide Stirs Pakistan
